column4: hi, whenever i try to start VisualBoyAdvance-gtk it says "bash: visualboyadvance-gtk: command not found" but i know i have it installed because when i try to install it again i get visualboyadvance-gtk is already the newest version." what could stop this from opening?
that will tell you the names of files in that package, then look for the name of the file in the /usr/bin folder
